content:
I think this is known, but I couldn't find an issue for it on the mathlib4 or lean4 repos. Often when I do simp? on an inequality, ge_iff_le appears in the list of simp only lemmas, even if no â‰¥ symbols appeared anywhere.

Should there be an issue about this, and where would it go if so? I can make an MWE and file it if it should exist.
Hmm, I thought this was fixed a while ago. Are you current?
Not quite, I'm on leanprover/lean4:v4.5.0-rc1. I'll update soon then. Thanks!
